description: This table extracts the related multiple response Most Recent Learner (I PED 485) item.

columns.name: PED_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the education record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: MOST_RECENT_PED_LEARNER_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the most recent learner's for the education point. For every new documentation for an education point, this item gets updated.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient


Family


Significant Other


Caregiver


Other
